channel.title: Car and Bike News: Read the latest Automobile News, Car and Bike Launches and Reviews | Hindustan Times
channel.description: Auto News - Read latest car and bike news from India and around the world price, specifications, and top features at Hindustan Times.

image.title: Car and Bike News: Read the latest Automobile News, Car and Bike Launches and Reviews | Hindustan Times

item.title: European Union votes to ban petrol, diesel car sales by 2035
item.description: EU member states have already approved the legislation and will now formally nod it into law, despite opposition from conservative MEPs.

item.title: Audi launches Q3 Sportback SUV in India, prices at ₹51.43 lakh
item.description: The SUV is the top-end variant of the Q3, which made its own India debut in August 2022.

item.title: Robotaxi, self-driving car from Amazon's Zoox, tested on public road for first time | Watch
item.description: The successful exercise was carried out on Feb 11 with company employees as passengers, said Zoox.

item.title: Ford is investing $3.5 billion in EV battery plant with Chinese firm: Report
item.description: The factory near Marshall, Michigan, will employ 2,500 workers, Ford said Monday. The facility is set to open in 2026 and will produce enough batteries to power 400,000 EVs a year.

item.title: Will Dubai's flying taxis take off by 2026?
item.description: Dubai's ruler, Sheikh Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum, announced the relaunched flying taxi program on Twitter Sunday.

item.title: Nissan, Renault to pump in $600 million to make 6 new models in India
item.description: The two companies said in a statement that each would make three new models in India, all built on joint platforms - components and engineering that can be shared between designs.

item.title: Hyundai India drops teaser of a new car. 2023 Verna coming?
item.description: “Ready to roar. Unleashing soon,” tweeted Hyundai India. The image attached in the tweet has a caption that says ‘Ferocious. Power beyond imagination.’

item.title: Delhi-Mumbai Expressway: PM Modi unveils first stretch; Check Toll price, speed limit
item.description: The Delhi-Mumbai Expressway connecting the national capital to the financial capital has 40 interchanges that will improve connectivity to Jaipur, Kishangarh, Ajmer, Kota, Chittorgarh, Udaipur, Bhopal, Ujjain, Indore, Ahmedabad, Vadodara, Surat.
